Title: Staff Data Scientist (New Verticals)
Description:
About Wolt

At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.

Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.

About The New Verticals Group

The New Verticals Group is all about expanding Wolt beyond Restaurants and helping deliver anything our Customers want with unprecedented convenience and world-leading customer experience. We want to make Wolt the best place to order what you need, be it groceries, convenience, pharmacy, electronics, home, pet stores, clothing, or other goods. Our vision is to make Wolt the world’s best shopping mall, in your pocket.

We work closely together with cross-functional teams to ensure that we have solid organic and inorganic growth plans, that we execute those perfectly in our country operations, and disseminate best practices across the organization to reduce the growth pains of rapid scaling (it always hurts when you grow >2x per year!)

About The Marketing & Affordability Analytics Team

Our Marketing & Affordability Analytics team uncovers insights on growth opportunities and consumer experience. We partner with Product, Engineering and Business teams to guide measurement and tactical decision-making using advanced analytics as we expand the Wolt platform across the globe.

You’ll collaborate with top Data Science and Analytics Engineering professionals who take ownership of the business outcomes. As we’re looking to grow to the next level of maturity, you’ll play a key role in establishing analytical expertise in various business domains.

About The Role

We’re looking for an awesome Staff Data Scientist in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm. You will be the partner for the New Verticals business and act as the go-getter analytics expert of your domain. You’ll have an opportunity to make a domain-wide impact, by partnering with senior leaders closely and driving the action from the frontlines.

The scope of the role ranges from helping cross-functional teams use various data points to size the potential opportunities, identifying and measuring levers to help move essential metrics, leveraging your technical and analytical skills to tell stories about business performance and make recommendations, and aligning executives around what matters and why.

Our offering to you


The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki, Berlin and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany, Sweden and Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.
Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
6+ years of experience in a Data Analytics or Data Science position
Expertise with SQL and statistical analysis using Python, R, or equivalent.
Strong know-how on experimentation techniques (A/B testing, causal inference) and hypothesis testing.
Ability to build intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence critical business decisions on senior leadership level, utilizing tools like Looker, Tableau, Mixpanel, or similar.
Clear and concise communication with strong cross-functional partnership experience.
Relentless pursuit of new ideas and data sources, and have the ability to systematically tackle ambiguous problems with a data-driven, hypothesis-based approach independently.
Ability to work and communicate effectively in English.


The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

Notice to Applicants for Jobs Located in NYC or Remote Jobs Associated With Office in NYC Only

We use Covey as part of our hiring and/or promotional process for jobs in NYC and certain features may qualify it as an AEDT in NYC. As part of the hiring and/or promotion process, we provide Covey with job requirements and candidate submitted applications. We began using Covey Scout for Inbound from August 21, 2023, through December 21, 2023, and resumed using Covey Scout for Inbound again on June 29, 2024.

The Covey tool has been reviewed by an independent auditor. Results of the audit may be viewed here: Covey

Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion

We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
AI Machine Learning Engineer – Berlin - (Hybrid/Remote Available)




My client is a fast-growing tech company in Berlin, leveraging AI and machine learning to solve real-world problems. If you're passionate about building cutting-edge AI models and deploying them at scale, they would want you on their team!




What You’ll Do

As an AI Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll work on end-to-end ML development, from research and model building to deployment and optimization. You’ll collaborate with software engineers, data scientists, and product teams to turn AI research into impactful applications.




Your responsibilities will include:

✅ Developing and deploying AI/ML models for real-world applications

✅ Writing clean, efficient, and scalable Python code

✅ Optimizing ML pipelines for performance and efficiency

✅ Working with cloud-based ML infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or Azure)

✅ Collaborating on MLOps and automation for model training & deployment

✅ Staying ahead of the latest AI/ML advancements




Ideal candidate:

🔹 3+ years of experience in AI/ML development

🔹 Strong programming skills in Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc.)

🔹 Experience in MLOps and deploying ML models to production

🔹 Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)

🔹 Background in software engineering (APIs, CI/CD, data pipelines)

🔹 Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for innovation




What they offer:

✨ Competitive salary

✨ Flexible working (hybrid or potentially remote)

✨ A high-impact role in a dynamic, fast-growing team

✨ Cutting-edge AI/ML challenges & modern tech stack




If you're interested, please apply or send your CV to j.oniah@annapurnarecruitment.com.




Please note: Due to a high number of applicants, only successful candidates will be contacted.

Title: Principal Data Scientist - Ad Tech
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are on the lookout for a Principal Data Scientist to join the Ad Tech data science team on our journey to always deliver amazing experiences.

As part of our Vendor Team, you’ll be the driving force behind the success of thousands of restaurants, shops, and local businesses. Your contributions will empower vendors with advanced tools to manage their operations, boosting their visibility, and reach. Every feature you help build will create growth opportunities for businesses of all sizes, strengthening Delivery Hero’s ecosystem and impact.

We are using AdTech to introduce people to new food they love and to enable our partners to meet their future customers at the perfect moment. a range of products that we have developed to offer advertising solutions for restaurants, which help them to increase their visibility and reach, improve their order conversion, and eventually drive more sales by covering the entire marketing funnel. Operating across about 70 countries around the clock, our AdTech connects the ideal advertiser with the ideal customer millions of times every day. In 2024/25, AdTech is a fundamental area for us on our path to profitability and is predicted to generate more than 1 billion euros in revenue for Delivery Hero; our innovative tech and product offering is the backbone of that development.

In this role, you will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth & profitability journey.


Work on one of the most exciting topics at Delivery Hero with significant top management attention
Drive transformative innovation in AI-powered ranking and bidding systems for digital advertising
Define and own the direction of data science models for our new adtech products to ensure they are built for our future needs
Lead the creation of advanced models and strategies that redefine auction dynamics, maximise advertiser ROI, and deliver exceptional user experiences
As an expert and visionary, you will elevate our advertising intelligence capabilities, setting new industry benchmarks while shaping the future of data-driven decision-making at scale.


What you need to be successful


Deep Learning Expertise: Extensive experience designing, training, and deploying large-scale neural network architectures.
Scalable Systems: Proven ability to work with distributed systems and frameworks for scaling AI models (eg TensorFlow or PyTorch).
Optimisation Skills: Expert knowledge of hyperparameter tuning, loss function selection, and efficient training techniques for high-throughput environments.
Ad-Tech Experience: Expertise with advertising KPIs, user intent prediction, ranking, and auction dynamics.
Data Science Foundations: Advanced understanding of statistical modelling, causal inference, and managing data layers.
Leadership Abilities: Strong collaboration and mentorship skills to be a company-wide thought leader with a developed ability to communicate research outcomes effectively to stakeholders.


Nice-to-Haves:


Expertise in econometrics or game theory as applied to auction and pricing strategies.
Contributions to open-source AI tools or publications in top-tier machine learning conferences.
Knowledge of calibration techniques (eg Platt scaling, isotonic regression) to ensure prediction reliability.
Familiarity with transformer-based architectures or graph neural networks for complex data interactions.


Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you’re excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world’s leading delivery platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

In this role, you will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth & profitability journey.

  • Work on one of the most exciting topics at Delivery Hero with significant top management attention
  • Drive transformative innovation in AI-powered ranking and bidding systems for digital advertising
  • Define and own the direction of data science models for our new adtech products to ensure they are built for our future needs
  • Lead the creation of advanced models and strategies that redefine auction dynamics, maximise advertiser ROI, and deliver exceptional user experiences
  • As an expert and visionary, you will elevate our advertising intelligence capabilities, setting new industry benchmarks while shaping the future of data-driven decision-making at scale.

What you need to be successful

  • Deep Learning Expertise: Extensive experience designing, training, and deploying large-scale neural network architectures.
  • Scalable Systems: Proven ability to work with distributed systems and frameworks for scaling AI models (eg TensorFlow or PyTorch).
  • Optimisation Skills: Expert knowledge of hyperparameter tuning, loss function selection, and efficient training techniques for high-throughput environments.
  • Ad-Tech Experience: Expertise with advertising KPIs, user intent prediction, ranking, and auction dynamics.
  • Data Science Foundations: Advanced understanding of statistical modelling, causal inference, and managing data layers.
  • Leadership Abilities: Strong collaboration and mentorship skills to be a company-wide thought leader with a developed ability to communicate research outcomes effectively to stakeholders.

Nice-to-Haves:

  • Expertise in econometrics or game theory as applied to auction and pricing strategies.
  • Contributions to open-source AI tools or publications in top-tier machine learning conferences.
  • Knowledge of calibration techniques (eg Platt scaling, isotonic regression) to ensure prediction reliability.
  • Familiarity with transformer-based architectures or graph neural networks for complex data interactions.

Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.

  • Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
  • We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
  • We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
  • Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
  • Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
  • The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.

Ready to join our team? If you’re excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world’s leading delivery platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: Data Scientist – NLP & Large Language Models – Gestalte die Zukunft intelligenter Datenlösungen
Description:
Data Scientist – NLP & Large Language Models– Gestalte die Zukunft intelligenter Datenlösungen




Mein Kunde ist ein führendes Unternehmen im Bereich Normung, Standardisierung und digitale Informationsverarbeitung. Ihre Mission ist es, Unternehmen, Forschungseinrichtungen und die öffentliche Hand mit zuverlässigen, strukturierten und hochqualitativen Normeninformationen zu versorgen. Dabei spielen moderne Technologien, innovative Softwarelösungen und leistungsstarke Datenbanken eine zentrale Rolle.




Das Team aus Experten entwickelt und betreibt hochmoderne Plattformen, die einen effizienten Zugang zu technischen Standards ermöglichen. Sie setzen auf eine offene, kollaborative Unternehmenskultur, in der neue Ideen gefördert und technologische Innovationen aktiv vorangetrieben werden.




Deine Mission

Als Data Scientist (m/w/d) mit Fokus auf Natural Language Processing (NLP) und Large Language Models (LLM) arbeitest Du an innovativen Lösungen, die KI-basierte Sprachverarbeitung auf das nächste Level heben. Du entwickelst und implementierst modernste Algorithmen und setzt LLMs für reale Anwendungen produktiv ein.







Deine Aufgaben

Modellentwicklung & Produktivsetzung – Du trainierst, optimierst und implementierst NLP- und LLM-Modelle für vielfältige Anwendungen.
Innovative KI-Anwendungen – Du erforschst neue Möglichkeiten für den Einsatz von NLP & LLMs in realen Geschäftsprozessen.
Technische Umsetzung – Planung, Installation und Betrieb von Open-Source-LLMs sowie Entwicklung von Webanwendungen und APIs zur Integration in bestehende Systeme.
Projektleitung & Zusammenarbeit – Du übernimmst Verantwortung in Projekten, arbeitest mit KI-Expert*innen zusammen und bringst Dein Know-how in interne Netzwerke ein.







Dein Profil

Studium in Statistik, Data Science, Mathematik, Informatik oder verwandten Bereichen
Fundiertes Wissen in NLP und LLMs – Du kennst Dich mit modernen KI-Architekturen aus
Python-Expertise im Data-Science-Umfeld
Kenntnisse in Git, Docker, Cloud-Technologien und Software-Entwicklung







Die Benefits

Maximale Flexibilität: 35-Stunden-Woche mit Option auf bis zu 42 Stunden
Mehr Freizeit: 30 Urlaubstage + Betriebsferien zwischen Weihnachten und Neujahr
Top-Standort: Zentral gelegen mit modernem Büro in Berlin
Gesundheit & Wohlbefinden: Kostenlose Physiotherapie, JobRad, Firmenticket-Zuschuss







Klingt spannend? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt und werde Teil eines Teams, das NLP & KI-Innovationen in die Praxis bringt!

Show more

Title: Associate Research Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
We’re looking for an Associate Research Scientist to help us accomplish our mission to improve and extend lives by learning from the experience of every person with cancer. Are you ready to be the next changemaker in cancer care?

Flatiron Health is a healthtech company using data for good to power smarter care for every person with cancer, around the world. Flatiron partners with cancer centers in the US, Europe and Asia to transform patients’ real-life experiences into real-world evidence and create a more modern, connected oncology ecosystem. Our multidisciplinary teams include oncologists, data scientists, software engineers, epidemiologists, product experts and more. Flatiron Health is an independent affiliate of the Roche Group.

What You'll Do

In this role, you will work as a member of the Research Sciences (RS) department, primarily supporting our work in the UK, Germany, and Japan. This team provides customized real-world data and real-world evidence solutions to address the most important research questions across clinical development, market access, and commercial use cases for our life sciences partners.

In this role, you will:



Develop subject matter expertise in real-world oncology data to support data product development and evidence generation.
Design and conduct in-depth analyses to assess data quality and fitness-for-use for real-world evidence generation in the international markets.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including epidemiologists, data scientists, and oncologists, to refine methodologies and ensure rigorous study execution.
Implement statistical analyses by translating analytic specifications from a statistical analysis plan into R code to generate descriptive and inferential statistics and develop visualizations.
Contribute to external scientific publications, including manuscripts and conference abstracts, to advance the field of oncology real-world evidence.
Stay current with epidemiological and statistical methodologies for analyzing observational real-world data and deepen expertise in cancer biology, therapies, and outcomes across multiple tumor types.



Who You Are

You're a kind, passionate and collaborative problem-solver who values the opportunity to think beyond the way things are. In addition, you’re an analytical thinker and excellent communicator with experience or interest in supporting design and execution of real-world studies that support use cases across the oncology product development life cycle. You are excited by the prospect of rolling up your sleeves to tackle meaningful problems each and every day. Additionally:



You hold a Master’s degree in Epidemiology, Biostatistics, Health Economics and Outcomes Research, Health Policy (or closely related field) with 2 - 3 years of relevant professional experience, or a Bachelor’s degree in one of those fields with 4-5 years of relevant professional experience
You have experience working in a pharmaceutical, HEOR consulting, healthcare analytics, or academic research environment
You have experience with observational datasets (e.g., registries, healthcare claims, or electronic health records)
You’re proficient at coding in R
You have strong communication skills, with experience contributing to study documentation
You have effective organizational, time-management, and prioritization and skills necessary to contribute to multiple high-visibility projects in a timely fashion
You have an agile mindset and adapt quickly to changes in project direction
You are able to quickly learn and apply new information, skills and procedures
You are passionate about our mission to improve healthcare through technology



Optional



You have oncology experience
You are fluent in German



Who We Are

Our people are at the centre of everything we do. We strive to foster a culture where our teammates feel equipped and empowered to make meaningful contributions with confidence, compassion, and clarity.
Show more

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Visier is the leader in people analytics and we believe in a 'people-first' approach to business strategy. Our innovative technology transforms the way that organisations make decisions, allowing them to elevate their employees and drive better business outcomes. Embarking on an exciting new chapter in our growth story, we are looking for talented individuals who can help both Visier and our customers grow, evolve and win!

Reporting to the Head of Data Science, you will work closely with other data scientists, data engineers, software developers and product managers to understand requirements and implement technology to extract unprecedented insights from Visier’s data assets.

What You'll Be Doing...


Build, Visier has access to a large and unique set of data that spans across thousands of businesses and millions of employees. You’ll leverage this data to build business applications and data products, such as resignation predictions, organizational design benchmarks, or salary benchmarks.
Drive innovation in our products by designing new capabilities based on advanced statistical techniques.
Research and develop prototypes and work with our software development teams to transform them into production level technology.
Design and implement scalable data pipelines to transfer your prototypes into production.


What you'll bring to the table...


A Master’s or PhD degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, Physics, or a similar field.
At least 3 years of industry experience working with mathematical modelling and advanced statistical techniques, such as hypothesis testing, high-dimensional regression analysis, and machine learning.
Expert level coding skills in Python, SQL and experience with common machine learning libraries
Solid experience with natural language processing techniques is a strong asset.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills related to presenting thoughts and results


Most importantly, you share our values...


You roll up your sleeves
You make it easy
You are proud
You never stop learning
You play to win


See the #VisierLife in action

Instagram - @visierlife

Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/company/visier-analytics/

Visier Candidate Privacy Notice and Recruiter Policy
Show more

Title: Research Sciences Intern (VISION)
Description:
Come build community, explore your passions and do your best work at Microsoft with thousands of University interns from every corner of the world. This opportunity will allow you to bring your aspirations, talent, potential—and excitement for the journey ahead.

The Applied Sciences Group (ASG) is seeking a highly motivated and talented PhD student to join our team as a Research Intern. This internship offers a unique opportunity to work on cutting-edge research in the fields of Large Language Models (LLMs), Vision-Language Models (VLMs), and Generative Image & Video. The successful candidate will collaborate with a team of experienced researchers and engineers to tackle real-world challenges and contribute to the advancement of AI technologies.

Responsibilities


Conduct research in one or more of the following areas: LLMs, VLMs, and Generative Image & Video.
Design and implement experiments to test new hypotheses and validate research findings.
Develop and optimise algorithms and models for various AI applications.
Collaborate with team members to integrate research outcomes into practical solutions.
Present research findings to the team and contribute to publications and patents.


Qualifications

Required: Qualifications:


Currently pursuing a PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field.
Strong background in LLMs, VLMs, or Generative Image & Video.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python.
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong communication skills and the ability to present complex ideas clearly.


Preferred Qualifications


Strong track record of success, evidenced by publications in prestigious computer vision and machine learning conferences, including NeurIPS, ECCV, ICCV, CVPR.
Proven software engineering capabilities, evidenced by professional experience, internships, impactful open-source contributions, and success in coding competitions.


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

Title: Senior Data Scientist - (Logistics, Workforce)
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist - (Logistics, Workforce) to join our Logistics team to help us create a fast, reliable and transparent delivery experience. You will make an impact in optimizing our on-demand last-mile delivery operations, involving hundreds of thousands of couriers and restaurants, improving the experience for millions orders per day in 70+ countries.


Conceptualize the right modeling approach for challenges in the field of Logistics at scale, together with your squad lead and our stakeholders.
Innovate new modeling solutions by drawing from fields like Machine Learning, Operations Research and Statistics that drive value for our business.
Pair-program with your squad to engineer solutions that automate the retraining of models and generation of predictions.
Provide ideas in brainstorming sessions with your Data Science colleagues to solve the toughest modeling problems together.
Help defining data needs to bring value to the projects and collaborate with the data engineering as well as with the tech teams in planning their roadmap.
Work with (semi-)structured data from our BigQuery DWH architecture and process with Spark where necessary.
Contribute and make an impact in a global, fast-moving tech organization.
Have fun and grow together with your team.


In our Logistics Team, you’ll tackle high-impact challenges that make last-mile delivery efficient, affordable, and sustainable. Your work will directly improve experiences for riders, end customers, and merchants across the globe. Each enhancement you contribute will help Delivery Hero optimize delivery operations, supporting expansion into new areas like grocery and retail.

What you need to be successful


You have at least 3 years of experience applying methods from machine learning to real-world datasets.
Fluency in Python and familiarity with its scientific/visualization libraries such as Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Plotly etc.
You can transfer business problems from a problem space to a technical solution space.
Experience in solving regression and classification type of problems with statistical, linear/non-linear models and ensemble models in particular (Random Forest/XGBoost/LightGBM/CatBoost).
Experience with Time-Series Forecasting, Operations Research, and Statistics is an interesting addition.
You know how to work with Big Data platforms such as Big Query/Spark and know how to write a SQL query to pull the data you need.
You can write maintainable code that follows best practices in software engineering.
Before starting to work on a use-case, you carefully challenge existing assumptions and care about clean data.
You are a strong communicator and can explain the intuition behind your modeling approach to people with different backgrounds.
You love to learn and you are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from different tech teams in a diverse environment.


Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you’re excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world’s leading delivery platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Each enhancement you contribute will help Delivery Hero optimize delivery operations, supporting expansion into new areas like grocery and retail.

What you need to be successful

  • You have at least 3 years of experience applying methods from machine learning to real-world datasets.
  • Fluency in Python and familiarity with its scientific/visualization libraries such as Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Plotly etc.
  • You can transfer business problems from a problem space to a technical solution space.
  • Experience in solving regression and classification type of problems with statistical, linear/non-linear models and ensemble models in particular (Random Forest/XGBoost/LightGBM/CatBoost).
  • Experience with Time-Series Forecasting, Operations Research, and Statistics is an interesting addition.
  • You know how to work with Big Data platforms such as Big Query/Spark and know how to write a SQL query to pull the data you need.
  • You can write maintainable code that follows best practices in software engineering.
  • Before starting to work on a use-case, you carefully challenge existing assumptions and care about clean data.
  • You are a strong communicator and can explain the intuition behind your modeling approach to people with different backgrounds.
  • You love to learn and you are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
  • You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from different tech teams in a diverse environment.

Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.

  • Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
  • We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
  • We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
  • Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
  • Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
  • The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.

Ready to join our team? If you’re excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world’s leading delivery platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: AI Agent Engineer
Description:
AI Agent Engineer | naptha.ai

About The Role

We are seeking an AI Agent Engineer to join our team at Naptha AI, where you'll help build and test AI agents using our interoperability platform. This role is perfect for developers who are passionate about AI and eager to gain hands-on experience with the latest agent frameworks and large language models.

Core Responsibilities


Build and deploy AI agents using various frameworks
Test agent interactions and document behavior
Help improve agent performance and reliability
Assist with agent integration and testing
Contribute to our growing agent ecosystem


Required Experience


Strong Python programming skills
Experience working with LLMs (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.)
Basic understanding of AI concepts
Ability to write clear documentation
Enthusiasm for AI and emerging technology


Nice to have


Familiarity with agent frameworks (LangChain, AutoGPT, etc.)
Basic DevOps knowledge
Experience with API development
Open source contributions


About The Hiring Process


Initial technical screen
Coding exercise
Team interview
Final discussion


Compensation & Benefits


Competitive salary and equity
Remote-first work environment
Full medical coverage
Flexible PTO
Learning budget


Join us in building the future of AI agent interoperability! This is an excellent opportunity to grow your skills in a rapidly evolving field.

Title: APPLIED SCIENTIST (FORECASTING) - MARKETS (ALL GENDERS)
Description:
THE ROLE & THE TEAM

As Applied Scientist (Forecasting) in the Markets organization, you will work in the Applied Science Forecasting team working with exceptional Applied Scientists to create bold research experiments with today's most exciting State-of-the-Art approaches in the scientific field. You will be contributing to the team developing cutting-edge forecasting solutions that will support the steering of Zalando’s $10Bn+ Business.

You will take the responsibility of developing machine learning solutions for our multiple KPI, timescale and time granularity forecasting problems. You will empower the team to stay up-to-date with the latest research in Forecasting Science for Demand Planning (e.g. forecasting market demand, logistics KPIs, etc). You will provide egoless and constructive scientific feedback to peers to become great researchers.

WHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)



You will be a senior contributor in our Applied Science team
Take the ownership in planning, developing, and monitoring the scientific solutions addressing the business problems of our stakeholders
Rigorous approach in solving, conducting, and documenting research projects
Good communication skills to translate (even complex) analytical / engineering decisions and outcomes to broader, non-technical audience
Work closely with ML engineers, applied scientists, and product team members in demand forecasting domain to bring our state of the art solutions to customers
Raise the scientific bar across your team and Zalando through publications in prestigious international conferences, and engaging in rigorous peer reviews. Actively collaborate with other teams and share knowledge and expertise within our talented applied science community.



WE’D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF YOU HAVE



Strong academic background in a STEM field or equivalent
Strong experience in Demand Forecasting science
Strong problem solving skills for Data Science
Experience in demand forecasting science related projects (e.g. full lifecycle of deep learning forecasting)
Experience in translating research into application with a good balance between scientific rigour and sustained relevance.
Experience or knowledge in causal machine learning
Strong Experience with Python in applied context - experience with ML frameworks (Pytorch, tensorflow, etc) applied for forecasting problems
Fluent business English.
Self-driven, intrinsic motivation for result implementation (action orientation).
Good to have Familiarity with machine learning infrastructure and tooling, such as Databricks, Spark, relational databases, AWS SageMaker, S3, EC2, Step Functions, Git



OUR OFFER

Zalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer



Employee shares program
40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
2 paid volunteering days a year
Hybrid working model with 60% (or more) remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
27 days of vacation a year (for Zalando SE)
Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
Family services, including counseling and support
Health and wellbeing options (including Gympass)
Mental health support and coaching available



INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN

At Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy

https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategy

Our employee resource groups

https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groups

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Generative AI & Evaluations Platform (f/m/d)*
Description:
Your Mission

As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer (f/m/d)*, you will work on Parloa’s Experimentation and Evaluation Platform and the models and software that power our generative AI products. You will work directly with product engineering and sales teams to help them evaluate and improve our AI Agents and the models that power them. You’ll build services that enable customers to evaluate AI Agents and run experiments. You’ll collaborate with Data Scientists to research and develop new product features - from testing new AI system optimisation frameworks to fine-tunning STT models on new languages and accents.

You’ll join the AI & Data Science Team, a collaborative group of Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists that own Parloa’s ML Platforms and Machine Learning models. The team is responsible for keeping Parloa at the forefront of research and development of Generative AI and AI Agent based products.

In This Role You Will


Take ownership of data science and machine learning projects that help us improve our generative AI product suite
Collaborate with product engineering and sales to shape requirements and our product vision leveraging AI and LLMs in line with customer needs
Execute machine learning projects end-to-end: understanding user-facing requirements, data gathering and transformation, exploratory data analysis, model productionization, maintenance and support, continuous improvement
Shape our ML platform (ML / LLM Ops) by defining the requirements and/or designing and implementing parts of it in collaboration with our data platform and DevOps teams


Our Tech stack (AI & Data): Python, OpenAI, LangGraph, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Eventhubs (Kafka), PostHog, Databricks, DeltaLiveTables, Preset

What You Bring To The Table


7+ years of experience as a machine learning engineer
Experience working with NLP, LLMs and information retrieval; experience with LLMs in a production environment is a strong plus
Strong proficiency in Python
Experience working with big data technologies (e.g. Spark) and using ML Ops platforms (e.g. MLFlow)
Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from gathering requirements to experimentation to productionisation, monitoring and optimization.
Experience in leading medium-sized technical projects (3-9 months roadmap)
Strong spoken and written communication skills in English


WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?


Be part of a dynamic, driven team of +40 nationalities with flat hierarchies and a collaborative company culture
Flexible office policy - we believe in hiring the best talent, no matter where they are based. However, we love to build real connections and want to welcome everyone in the office
Attractive compensation package
Training and development budget which can be used for conferences and attending development courses to ensure continuous professional growth
Flexible working hours, 28 vacation days and workation opportunities
Enjoy unlimited access to a variety of fitness, yoga, and leisure activities via Wellpass or Urban Sport Club.
We cover the cost of a monthly Deutschland train ticket.
Leverage exclusive offers with our corporate benefits portal, giving you access to compelling deals from leading brands.
Regular team events, game nights, and other social activities
And last but not least: a beautiful office with flair in the heart of Berlin with all the conveniences, such as adjustable desks, social area, fresh fruits, cereals and drinks
Is something missing here? Reach out and let's talk about what else you need for your ideal next growth opportunity


Your Recruiting Process At Parloa

Recruiter video call → Hiring Manager Interview → Technical Stage (Coding Session) + Machine Learning (Case Study) → Meeting the team

Why Parloa?

Parloa is one of the fastest growing startups in the world of Generative AI and customer service. Parloa’s voice-first GenAI platform for contact centers is built on the best AI technology to automate customer service with natural-sounding conversations for outstanding experiences on all communication channels. Leveraging natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, Parloa creates intelligent phone and chat solutions for businesses that turn contact centers into value centers by boosting customer service efficiency. The Parloa platform resolves the majority of customer queries quickly and automatically, allowing human agents to focus on complex issues and relationships. Parloa was founded in 2018 by Malte Kosub and Stefan Ostwald and today employs over 250 people in Berlin, Munich, and New York.

When you join Parloa, you become part of a dynamic and innovative team made up of over 34 nationalities that’s revolutionizing an entire industry. We’re passionate about growing together and creating opportunities for personal and professional development. With our recent $66 million Series B investment, we’re expanding globally and looking for talented individuals to join us on this exciting journey.

Do you have questions about Parloa, the role, or our team before you apply? Please feel free to get in touch with our Hiring Team.

Parloa is committed to upholding the highest data protection standards for our clients' and employees' data. All our employees are instrumental in ensuring the utmost care, GDPR, and ISO compliance, including ISO 27001, in handling sensitive information.


We provide equal opportunities to all qualified applicants regardless race, gender, sexual orientation, age, religion, national origin, disability status, socioeconomic background and other characteristics.

Title: Lead Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Lead Machine Learning Engineer

Industry - MedTech

Location - Berlin | Hybrid




About Us:

We're excited to be working alongside is a dynamic and rapidly growing MedTech startup based in the heart of Berlin. They're developing cutting-edge AI-powered tools and their core mission is to revolutionize healthcare by leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to improve patient outcomes and empower medical professionals.




The Role:

We're seeking a passionate and experienced Lead Machine Learning Engineer to spearhead the development and implementation of our AI/ML solutions. You will be a key driver in shaping our technology roadmap, leading a team of talented engineers, and ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality, impactful products. You will be responsible for designing, building, and deploying advanced machine learning models into production, optimizing performance, and staying at the forefront of the latest advancements in the field.




Responsibilities:

Lead and mentor a team of machine learning engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.
Design, develop, and deploy robust and scalable machine learning models for [specific application, e.g., image analysis, predictive modeling, natural language processing].
Collaborate with data engineers to ensure high-quality data pipelines for model training and evaluation.
Optimize existing algorithms and develop novel approaches to improve model accuracy, efficiency, and robustness.
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in machine learning and AI, and identify opportunities for innovation.
Integrate machine learning models into our software platform and ensure seamless deployment.
Work closely with product managers, medical experts, and software engineers to define requirements and deliver impactful solutions.
Implement and maintain monitoring systems to track model performance and identify areas for improvement.
Ensure that all developed solutions adhere to relevant regulatory standards (e.g., GDPR, MDR).
Create clear and comprehensive documentation for models, algorithms, and processes.




Qualifications:

Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in developing and deploying machine learning models, with a proven track record of success.
trong proficiency in Python and relevant machine learning libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Experience with deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing, or other relevant domains.
Experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
Experience with data processing and analysis tools (e.g., Pandas, NumPy).
Knowledge of software engineering best practices and version control (e.g., Git).
Experience with MLOps practices.
Proven ability to lead and mentor a team of engineers.
Fluent in English. German is a plus.




What We Offer:

A challenging and rewarding role in a fast-growing MedTech startup.
The opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI/ML technology that has a real impact on people's lives.
A collaborative and supportive work environment.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Flexible working hours and remote work options.
Opportunities for professional development and growth.
A modern office in the heart of Berlin.
The chance to contribute to the future of healthcare.




To Apply:

Please submit your CV as soon as possible to be considered, interviews are ongoing.

Title: (Senior) Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)
Company: MSG Food ام اس جي الغذائية
Description:
Berlin
Vollzeit
unbefristet


Teile diesen Job!

Jetzt bewerben!

Strategische Beratung, spannende (IT-)Projekte, attraktive Karrierechancen, Kontinuität, Sicherheit und Nachhaltigkeit – das alles findest du bei der msg Gruppe. Denn als unabhängige international agierende Unternehmensgruppe mit weltweit mehr als 10.000 Mitarbeitenden sind wir in vielen dynamischen Märkten aktiv und unterstützen unsere Kunden als starker Partner bei der digitalen Transformation.

Wir entwickeln im Geschäftsbereich msg.AI innovative Kundenlösungen in den Bereichen Artificial Intelligence und Data Science, um unseren Kunden in spannenden IT-Projekten technisch sowie fachlich zur Seite zu stehen. Hier stehen besonders die Entwicklung kompletter LLM basierter Lösungen und die Beratung zu Gen AI wie auch Machine-Learning im Fokus. Werde Teil unserer msg-Kultur!

Das erwartet dich bei uns


Gestaltung und Umsetzung innovativer Digitalisierungsprojekte im übergreifenden KI-Bereich msg.AI von der Idee bis zum Betrieb
Identifikation von Anwendungsfällen & Integration von KI-Technologien (v.a. LLM, NLP und Machine Learning) als Enabler für diverse Branchen
Verantwortung für die technische Implementierung von KI-Modellen und ML-Algorithmen in einem interdisziplinären Team
Unterstützung bei der Definition von KPIs und Ergebnismetriken zur Evaluation von Algorithmen
Anwendung von Best Practices im Bereich KI-Engineering und ML-Operations
Evaluierung neuer Technologien und Tools
Sicherstellung der Einhaltung von Qualitätsstandards und Best Practices in der KI-Entwicklung

Strategische Beratung, spannende (IT-)Projekte, attraktive Karrierechancen, Kontinuität, Sicherheit und Nachhaltigkeit – das alles findest du bei der msg Gruppe. Denn als unabhängige international agierende Unternehmensgruppe mit weltweit mehr als 10.000 Mitarbeitenden sind wir in vielen dynamischen Märkten aktiv und unterstützen unsere Kunden als starker Partner bei der digitalen Transformation.

Wir entwickeln im Geschäftsbereich msg.AI innovative Kundenlösungen in den Bereichen Artificial Intelligence und Data Science, um unseren Kunden in spannenden IT-Projekten technisch sowie fachlich zur Seite zu stehen. Hier stehen besonders die Entwicklung kompletter LLM basierter Lösungen und die Beratung zu Gen AI wie auch Machine-Learning im Fokus. Werde Teil unserer msg-Kultur!

Das erwartet dich bei uns

  • Gestaltung und Umsetzung innovativer Digitalisierungsprojekte im übergreifenden KI-Bereich msg.AI von der Idee bis zum Betrieb
  • Identifikation von Anwendungsfällen & Integration von KI-Technologien (v.a. LLM, NLP und Machine Learning) als Enabler für diverse Branchen
  • Verantwortung für die technische Implementierung von KI-Modellen und ML-Algorithmen in einem interdisziplinären Team
  • Unterstützung bei der Definition von KPIs und Ergebnismetriken zur Evaluation von Algorithmen
  • Anwendung von Best Practices im Bereich KI-Engineering und ML-Operations
  • Evaluierung neuer Technologien und Tools
  • Sicherstellung der Einhaltung von Qualitätsstandards und Best Practices in der KI-Entwicklung

  • Fortgeschrittene Kenntnisse in Python, Git und einschlägigen ML-Bibliotheken und Frameworks
  • Erfahrung mit Tools zur Datenvisualisierung (z.B. Seaborn, Matplotlib, Plotly)
  • Erfahrung mit Cloud-Plattformen (z. B. AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
  • Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
AI Engineer

Location: Berlin/Hybrid




We are seeking a talented and driven AI Engineer to join fast-growing AI start-up, REMATIQ. This is an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI solutions that are transforming regulatory affairs. As a AI Engineer, you will take ownership of designing, building, and scaling machine learning systems that drive impactful innovation in the industry.




Responsibilities

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy machine learning models into production.
Build and optimize scalable and efficient machine learning pipelines for data processing, model training, and deployment.
Lead efforts in identifying, implementing, and validating the best algorithms and techniques for solving business challenges.
Take ownership of model performance, monitoring, and continuous improvement in production.
Mentor junior team members and contribute to fostering a collaborative engineering culture.
Research and stay up-to-date on advancements in machine learning, MLOps, and related technologies.
Contribute to the development of best practices in model lifecycle management, including reproducibility and version control.




Requirements

Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or AI Engineer in a similar role, with expertise in Python.
Strong track record of delivering production-grade machine learning systems, including model deployment and monitoring.
Proficiency in at least one of the following areas:
Data Science: Advanced analytics, statistical modeling, and insights generation.
MLOps: Building robust CI/CD pipelines for machine learning workflows and automation.
Large Language Models (LLMs): Fine-tuning, training, or deploying state-of-the-art transformer-based models.
Natural Language Processing (NLP): Developing applications like text classification, summarization, or entity recognition.
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced environment.
Familiarity with scalable data storage and processing systems (e.g., Spark, Hadoop, or similar).
Passion for leveraging AI to revolutionize regulatory affairs.




Nice-to-Have Skills

Experience working in an early-stage start-up
Familiarity with regulatory affairs or compliance-related applications.
Contributions to open-source machine learning projects.
Expertise in deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Strong software engineering practices, including code reviews, testing, and documentation.




Why Join Us?

Innovative Mission: Be part of transforming regulatory affairs with cutting-edge AI technology.
Impactful Role: Take ownership of significant projects and contribute to shaping the future of the industry.
Collaborative Environment: Work with a small, ambitious team where everyone has real ownership over the product and company.
Growth Opportunities: Learn and grow in a fast-paced start-up environment with continuous professional development.
Compensation: Competitive salary and a generous equity package for early employees..




Join REMATIQ and be a driving force in revolutionizing regulatory affairs through AI. If you are a passionate and skilled AI Engineer ready to make an impact, we’d love to hear from you!

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Company: SR2 | Socially Responsible Recruitment | Certified B Corporation™
Description:
SR2 are partnered with a global consultancy who are looking for Data Science specialists.




In this role, you will leverage your expertise in data analysis and statistical modeling to help clients uncover trends, patterns, and insights from their data. You will work on projects involving data collection, cleaning, visualization, and interpretation, turning complex datasets into actionable insights that inform business strategy. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, proficiency in programming languages like Python or R, and experience with data visualisation and statistical techniques.




Requirements:

Bachelor’s or Master’s in Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field.
Proficient in Python and data analysis libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, or scikit-learn.
Familiar with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
Experience with Databricks is essential.
Strong problem-solving, critical thinking, and communication skills.




Role

6-12+ month contract with high probability of extension
Hybrid with occasional travel to Munich
Candidates have to be based in Germany
2x Stage interview process




If you're passionate about using data to solve real-world business challenges, we'd love to hear from you.

Title: Back End Developer
Description:
Job Opportunity: Senior Backend Engineer (Berlin, Germany)




Location: Berlin, On-site with flexible work-from-home options available




Salary: €85,000 annually + equity




About Us:

We are a fast-growing startup focused on revolutionizing the customer experience in the e-commerce space through AI-powered messaging. Our platform integrates seamlessly with e-commerce platforms, offering cutting-edge chatbots and virtual assistants that help brands connect with customers. As we expand rapidly, we are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join our team and help shape the future of our innovative product.




The Role:

As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will take ownership of building and maintaining the backend infrastructure that powers our AI-driven e-commerce platform. You’ll work closely with frontend engineers and AI teams to ensure smooth integration between the customer-facing application and the backend systems. The ideal candidate is someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and enjoys working on impactful, large-scale backend solutions.




Key Responsibilities:

Backend Development & Support: Work on the backend system to ensure smooth functionality for the e-commerce platform. This includes working on tracking and messaging structures.
AI Integration: Contribute to the development and integration of our AI-powered solutions, such as chatbots and virtual assistants.
E-commerce Focus: Build scalable backend solutions for messaging and AI integrations tailored to e-commerce environments.
Collaborate with Frontend Team: Ensure seamless communication between backend and frontend systems, working closely with the frontend engineers.
Team Contribution: Collaborate within a small, dynamic team, taking ownership of backend features and helping mentor junior engineers as we expand.




Must-Have Skills:

TypeScript (Node.js): Strong expertise in backend development using TypeScript with Node.js.
E-commerce Experience: Prior experience in developing backend systems for e-commerce platforms, ideally with a focus on messaging or AI-powered applications.
AI & Messaging Experience: Familiarity with building backend systems that support AI-driven tools or messaging platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, etc.
English Communication: Proficiency in English for communication with the team and clients.
Senior-level Experience: Significant backend engineering experience, particularly with building scalable and maintainable systems.




Future Projects:

E-commerce AI Agents: Work on developing AI agents for e-commerce platforms, focusing on messaging and customer engagement through popular platforms like Instagram and WhatsApp.
Onsite Helpers: Contribute to the development of AI-powered helpers, similar to Clippy, for e-commerce websites.




Why Join Us:

Ownership: You’ll have a direct impact on the evolution of our product and play a critical role in shaping the future of e-commerce AI.
Fun Environment: A casual, collaborative culture with opportunities for team activities like bowling, Nintendo Switch games, and classes.
Career Growth: Strong potential for leadership growth as the company expands.
Innovation: Work on cutting-edge AI and messaging platforms that are changing the future of online shopping.




What We Offer:

Competitive salary: €85k annually, with potential salary increases post-funding.
Equity Options: 0.5-0.75% equity for senior candidates.
Flexible Work Arrangements: Office-based in Berlin with some remote work flexibility.
Visa and Relocation Support: Visa sponsorship and a relocation package (up to €1-3k) available.
BVG Card and Leasing Scheme: Get support for transportation and bike leasing.




If you're passionate about backend engineering and want to be part of a growing, innovative team in the e-commerce and AI space, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and join us in building the future of e-commerce!

This version focuses on backend responsibilities, the technical stack, and projects with an emphasis on AI, e-commerce, and messaging systems. Let me know if you'd like any changes!

Title: AI Data Scientist - Relocate To Saudi Arabia
Description:
Please note that this role is based in Saudi Arabia on a permanent, residential basis.







Job Req ID: 15496




Description:

Aramco energizes the world economy.

Aramco occupies a unique position in the global energy industry. We are the world's largest producer of hydrocarbons (oil and gas), with the lowest upstream carbon intensity of any major producer.

With our significant investment in technology and infrastructure, we strive to maximize the value of the energy we produce for the world along with a commitment to enhance Aramco’s value to society.

Headquartered in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and with offices around the world, we combine market discipline with a generations’ spanning view of the future, born of our nine decades experience as responsible stewards of the Kingdom’s vast hydrocarbon resources. This responsibility has driven us to deliver significant societal and economic benefits to not just the Kingdom, but also to a vast number of communities, economies, and countries that rely on the vital and reliable energy that we supply.

We are one of the most profitable companies in the world, as well as amongst the top five global companies by market capitalization.







Overview




We are seeking a Data Scientist to join our Artificial Intelligence and Analytics Organization (AI&A).




AI&A, within our Digital transformation office, is dedicated to realizing business added value from leveraging the latest technological advancements of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and analytics. We are a center of excellence in Saudi Aramco for Artificial Intelligence technologies and data science.




Your primary role is to identify potential value from data, formulate AI and data science ideas and conceptualize them.







Key Responsibilities




As the successful candidate you will be required to perform the following:

Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions.
Mine and analyze data from company data sources to drive optimization and improvement of product development, and business strategies.
Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.
Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to datasets.
Support ideation endeavors in packaging new ideas/products and preparing them for minimal viable product development.
Assess AI applicability in enhancing current business processes.







Minimum Requirements




As the successful candidate you must hold a Master of Science or PhD degree in data science, computer science, computer vision, applied mathematics or a related field.
You must have a minimum of 8 years of hands-on experience in Data Science & AI projects (Generative AI, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Time Series). Experience in the energy sector is a plus.
You must be able to demonstrate experience of bringing ideas from conceptualization to productionalization using the right tools (e.g. mlflow, Kubeflow, tensorlight, etc.).
You must also be able to showcase a very strong expertise in data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing, and wrangling.
You should be fluent in either R, or Python; both is preferred, and familiarity with Golang is a plus.
You should have at least 5 years of experience in building computer vision-based product.
You should be able to apply transfer learning on models like, VGG16, LeNet, ResNet, AlexNet, etc.
You must be proficient in deep learning tools keras, TensorFlow, pytorch, cafee, OpenCV and/or dlib, and scikit-image.
You must be able to build object detection models, face/gesture recognition, and identification engines.
You should be experienced in Information Retrieval (Content Recommendation, Search Metrics, Search Query, document classification, entity recognition, topic modelling, etc.).
You should be proficient in transfer learning and in fine tuning open-sourced models like BERT.
You should have least 5 years of experience in building time series forecasting models.
You should be expert in time series forecasting models and in using technologies like LSTMs, Prophet, and time series analysis.
You should be proficient in using sklearn pandas, NumPy, plotly, seaborn, and relevant R libraries if R is their preferred language.







Working environment

Our high-performing employees are drawn by the challenging and rewarding professional, technical and industrial opportunities we offer, and are remunerated accordingly.

At Aramco, our people work on truly world-scale projects, supported by investment in capital and technology that is second to none. And because, as a global energy company, we are faced with addressing some of the world’s biggest technical, logistical and environmental challenges, we invest heavily in talent development.

We have a proud history of educating and training our workforce over many decades. Employees at all levels are encouraged to improve their sector-specific knowledge and competencies through our workforce development programs – one of the largest in the world.




Country/Region: SA
